title: Migration: after eighteen months (TEFC)
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Social conditions

description: This is the last film about the Rata family and their emigration from Finland to Australia. It looks at the occurrences of the 18 months stay and the reasons leading to the family's decision to return home to Finland. It contrasts their expectations with the reality of living in Australia.
